name: Run for their lives
description:
'Run for their lives' is a game developed for LudumDare46 with 'Keep it alive' as theme. 

This game has been the first one developed on a JS game engine. I really hope you enjoy it as much as I've developing it.

Controls:
  - Mouse (touch)
  - Arrow Keys (also AWSD)

Tools:
  - Custom JS game engine.
  - Google Slides and Gimp.
